import React from "react"; import { AiFillEye, AiOutlineMessage } from 'react-icons/ai' import { useCallback } from 'react' import moment from 'moment'; export const PostPage = () => { const post = 'res' const fetchPost = useCallback(async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/posts/${params.id}`) setPost(data) }, [params.id]) return (
{post?.imgUrl && ( )}
{post.usename}
{moment(post.createdAt).format("MM/DD/YYYY")}
{post.title}

{post.text}

) }
